feed.title: SailrMC
feed.subtitle: An Open Source Minecraft launcher with the ability to manage multiple instances, accounts and mods. Focused on user freedom and free redistributability.

entry.title: SailrMC second prerelease (7.0) has been released.

content.p: Here comes the 2nd (pre-)release! We've worked quite a lot and added (also re-added) some features! More information in the news article. Thank you for using SailrMC

entry.title: SailrMC first prerelease (7.0) has been released.

content.p: The first preview of SailrMC has been announced! This is a fork of PrismLauncher 7.0, and this marks the first milestone. More information in the news article.
This is just a test for the brand new RSS feed for the launcher.
